name: Covid-19 by API-Ninjas
description: Covid-19 case count and death data for every country in the world. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/covid19.

api_methods.name: /v1/covid19
api_methods.description: API Ninjas Covid19 API endpoint. Either **date** or **country** must be set.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type of data to retrieve. Must be either cases or deaths. If not set, cases will be used by default.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: date to retrieve single-day snapshot. Must be in the form of YYYY-MM-DD (e.g. 2022-01-01)

parameters.name: county
parameters.description: county name for US states (case insensitive). For United States data only. Must be used in conjunction with country (United States) and region (e.g. California).

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: administrative region (also known as state or province in many countries) name (case insensitive). Must be used in conjunction with country. If not set, countries with data broken down by administrative regions will return separate data for each region.

utterances.utterance: What are the Covid-19 case numbers for Italy on 2023-09-15?
How many Covid-19 deaths were reported in Brazil on 2023-08-01?
Give me the Covid-19 case count for the United States.
What is the Covid-19 death toll in India as of 2023-10-01?
Can you provide the Covid-19 cases for Germany on 2023-07-20?
How many Covid-19 deaths occurred in France on 2023-06-15?
What are the Covid-19 case numbers for California, United States?
Tell me the Covid-19 death statistics for New York, United States on 2023-05-10.
What is the Covid-19 case count for Tokyo, Japan?
How many Covid-19 deaths were reported in Ontario, Canada on 2023-04-01?
